segments.text: I really think all Americans look alike .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re crazy ! You haven ’ t been here long enough .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They wear the same clothes , they ’ re all blond , they all drive cars , they all own Parker fountain pens ; they all drink Coca Cola , and they all chew gum .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I disagree with you . They don ’ t all wear the same clothes ; they ’ re definitely not all blond ; they don ’ t all own Parker fountain pens ; they don ’ t all drink Coca Cola , and they don ’ t all chew gum . I do think they all drive cars though ! But that doesn ’ t have anything to do with how they look !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe I am just homesick . I know you ’ re right . I just miss China , that ’ s all .
segments.speaker: S1
